title: Little Critter's the Night Before Christmas
description:
Mercer Mayer's Little Critter is back, this time for an endearing retelling of a Christmas classic.Join Little Critter as he dreams of dancing sugarplums while patiently waiting for Santa and his reindeer to arrive. Then keep an eye out while he watches in wonder as Santa Claus visits his house and fills his stockings with gifts.
Mercer Mayer's
 
Little Critter
 stories, which address all the major issues of growing up, are perennial favorites to generations of readers of all ages.Edition MSRP: $4⁹⁹ U.S. / $ 6⁹⁹ CAN. (ISBN 0-679-87352-X)
author: Mercer Mayer
